title: nf-core/pipeline pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input - supports multiple sequencing technologies (Illumina, ONT, PacBio)

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

ilmn_fastq1.errorMessage: Illumina FastQ file for reads 1 must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

ilmn_fastq2.errorMessage: Illumina FastQ file for reads 2 cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

ont_fastq.errorMessage: ONT FastQ file cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

pb_fastq.errorMessage: PacBio FastQ file cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'
